summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 CADILLAC XTS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE TOUCH PAD ON THE INSTRUMENT PANEL FAILED TO OPERATE. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO FITZGERALD CADILLAC ANNAPOLIS (34 HUDSON ST, ANNAPOLIS, MD 21401, (301) 261-8246) WHERE THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE TOUCH SCREEN NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 19,000. *TT*JB
